titleInfo.title: Apology for Dr. Clarke : containing an account of the late proceedings in Convocation upon his writings concerning the Trinity

originInfo.publisher: Printed for E. Burleigh in Amen Corner

mods.tableOfContents: The complaint of the Lower-House. June 2, 1717 -- The answer of the Bishops. June 4 -- Their message, directing an Extract of particulars. June 12 -- The extract of particulars, made by the Lower-House, June 23 -- Dr. Clarke's reply to the fore-going extract. Jun 26. "Never before published" -t.p. -- A paper laid by Dr. Clarke before the Bishops. July 2 -- A letter to Dr. Clarke, occasioned by the fore-going paper. "Never before published" -t.p. -- Part of a letter from Dr. Clarke, in answer to the fore-going. "Never before published" -t.p. -- A paper from Dr. Clarke delivered to the Bishop of London. July 5 "Never before published" -t.p. -- The resolution of the Upper-House. July 5 -- The resolution of the Lower-House. July 7.
mods.note: published by the author of the above-mentioned letter to Dr. Clarke.
Consists of 11 brief papers, including pronouncements by Convocation, replies by Clarke, and a letter to Clarke by John Laurence.
ASC: from the Yolton Library Rare Book Collection.
